<h3 id="X11500">X(11500)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE AND OUTER-JOHNSON</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-(b+c)*a^5-2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^4+2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+(b^2-c^2)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2*b*c  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11500) = (2*R+r)*X(3)-2*R*X(10) = (R+r)*X(4)-(R+2*r)*X(12)</b>
<p>X(11500) lies on these lines:{1,227}, {3,10}, {4,12}, {5,1001}, {6,3072}, {8,411}, {9,10268}, {11,6834}, {20,100}, {30,4421}, {35,1012}, {40,64}, {42,5706}, {56,944}, {71,5776}, {84,165}, {104,5204}, {108,3176}, {119,6928}, {198,281}, {221,1745}, {222,1771}, {228,1867}, {255,9370}, {381,4428}, {404,5731}, {405,5587}, {474,3576}, {480,5759}, {497,6848}, {498,6831}, {516,5812}, {517,3811}, {518,5534}, {528,8668}, {581,5711}, {602,4383}, {631,4413}, {692,6759}, {910,7719}, {946,3295}, {952,11249}, {954,5715}, {956,5881}, {960,5720}, {962,3871}, {971,1158}, {999,5882}, {1004,10884}, {1006,5818}, {1064,5710}, {1103,7070}, {1125,6918}, {1210,1617}, {1329,6827}, {1385,6911}, {1466,4293}, {1478,10954}, {1479,1532}, {1486,1598}, {1498,2947}, {1512,1837}, {1537,10087}, {1593,5130}, {1621,3091}, {1656,8167}, {1699,3746}, {1737,7742}, {1754,3293}, {1766,3694}, {1788,5768}, {1854,3465}, {2078,9581}, {2095,3874}, {2222,2733}, {2550,6908}, {2551,6987}, {2886,6825}, {3035,6891}, {3052,3073}, {3058,10531}, {3086,6927}, {3090,4423}, {3158,6769}, {3256,9579}, {3303,5603}, {3304,7967}, {3359,9943}, {3575,11383}, {3616,6915}, {3651,5584}, {3681,9960}, {3689,7957}, {3816,6944}, {3826,6989}, {3925,6889}, {4254,10445}, {4551,7078}, {4640,7330}, {4999,6954}, {5056,5284}, {5217,6906}, {5218,6847}, {5230,5721}, {5248,6913}, {5259,7989}, {5285,9122}, {5432,6833}, {5433,6880}, {5434,10805}, {5531,5904}, {5552,6836}, {5658,6361}, {5698,5811}, {5704,7677}, {5730,6326}, {5780,10176}, {5870,10922}, {5871,10921}, {6668,6859}, {6690,6824}, {6691,6970}, {6844,10588}, {6883,9956}, {6896,7958}, {6924,10269}, {6925,10522}, {6934,7354}, {6941,10896}, {6962,10527}, {6969,10591}, {6986,9780}, {7411,9799}, {7420,10454}, {7971,7991}, {8069,10572}, {9342,10303}, {9838,10951}, {9839,10952}, {9841,10270}, {9873,10872}, {10175,11108}, {10795,11490}, {10944,10966}</p>
<p>
X(11500) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {40,1490}, {5534,5709}, {7971,7991}<br>
X(11500) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3,6796), (1158,3579), (10306,8715), (10526,10942)<br>
X(11500) = X(4)-of-outer-Johnson-triangle<br>
X(11500) = X(4)-of-anti-Mandart-incircle-triangle<br>
X(11500) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3,355,958), (3,9709,6684), (3,11499,1376), (4,12,10894), (4,55,11496), (4,3085,7680), (4,10786,12), (4,11491,55), (5,10267,1001), (8,411,3428), (12,6284,10953), (20,100,10310), (35,5691,1012), (100,3436,1259), (104,6942,5204), (944,6905,56), (3651,5657,5584), (4413,8273,631), (5587,10902,405), (5687,7580,40), (5881,11012,956)<br>
</p>
